name: Cards of the Cosmos
description:
Cards of the Cosmos is a deck-building card game.

You lose if your deck reaches 0 cards, and win if the enemy deck reaches 0 first. 

Each run consists of a series of encounters that provide gold when beaten.  After your inevitable defeat, visit the card shop where you can use gold to add cards to your deck. Loss is unavoidable... or is it?

  • Click on cards in your hand to play them
  • Cards cost one energy to play
  • Energy is set to one at the beginning of each turn
  • If you run out of cards in your deck before your opponent, you lose
  • Some cards create persistent effects on the field
  • Gain gold by defeating opponents and spend it in the shop
  • Cards purchased this way are permanently included in your deck
  • The Infinite always wins... or does it?
